document.full_text: sally meyerhoff, who recently qualified for the 2012 olympic trials, died on march 8 at 27 when her bike and a pickup truck collided while she was training.
document.title: mourning a marathoner who loved her life
lines_and_colors: sally meyerhoff, who recently qualified for the 2012 olympic trials, died on march 8 at 27 when her bike and a pickup truck collided while she was training.
